nodes.text: Emberlene memorial shrines were built by the people that had left their home world of Emberlene after it had been razed. Refugees of Emberlene like the members of the Mistryl Shadow Guard would seek out these shrines to remember their former home and leave offerings. Most such memorial shrines were stocked with Emberlene Essence, a musky fragrance that evoked memories of Emberlene's deep woods.

One such memorial shrine could be found in a safe house of the Mistryl Shadow Guard outside of Theed on the planet Naboo. In 1.5 ABY an agent of the Azure Cabal broke into the house and stole a bottle of Emberlene Essence from the shrine.
